item.title: RTX’s Raytheon Gets Spain’s Largest-Ever Patriot Systems Deal Worth $1.7 Billion
item.description: Spain’s order with Raytheon for four Patriot systems will include radars, launchers, command-and-control stations, and training equipment.

item.title: Aduro Clean Technologies Announces Closing of US$20 Million Underwritten Public Offering
ZenaTech Closes Acquisition of Vara 3D, a Utah-Based Surveying and Mapping Firm Expanding Drone-as-a-Service to the High-Growth Solar Infrastructure Market
Why Did RVPH Stock Crash 50% Today?
item.description: The company announced that the FDA called for an additional Phase 3 trial of its schizophrenia treatment drug.

item.title: Ryan Detrick Says Santa Rally Likely This Time After Not Showing Up For Past Two Years
item.description: The market strategist also dismissed concerns of a bear market amid a decline in volatility this month.
